frontmatter.description: With me doing more livecoding sessions on Twitch, I wanted to embed some clips into my blog posts and hit some weird issues. I managed to get it working and wanted to document the workaround so I don't forget it.
frontmatter.title: Working around 'Refuses to Connect' Issues with IFrame Embedded Twitch Players
